author: Staff Reporter
text:
Tense moments prevailed at Kalapatti on Wednesday after the Hindu Munnani cadre protested the functioning of a church in their locality.

Kovilpalayam Police said that the church was inaugurated amid police security on Wednesday.

The Hindu Munnani cadre opposed the construction and the functioning of the church as it was located close to a temple.

The church had obtained an order in their favour from the Madras High Court. They have asked the protestors to approach the issue through the court, the police sources said.

Arrested

Meanwhile, in another incident S. Chandrasekar and Selvaraj of Highways Colony on Trichy Road were arrested by the Race Course Police on Wednesday for allegedly placing a Cross at an Amman temple in that locality.
title: Protest against construction of church near temple
